item.title: Report E-2024070416
item.description:
Report E-2024070416

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-19T18:15:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-26
  • City: RICHLAND
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 2 gallons of Thermaline 4700 Aluminum was released from two 1-gallon metal pails due to improper loading by LFY. The release impacted trailer #3119146. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning up the release with PPE available on-site.
